data.comment: Today's referee, Steven McLean, has blown to start the match.
Steven McLean awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, Rangers to take a throw-in in Dundee United territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Dundee United needs to be cautious. Rangers have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 5, Steven McLean signals a throw-in for Rangers, close to Dundee United's area.
Can Rangers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dundee United's half?
Rangers's James Tavernier gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Dundee United defender.
In the minute 8, Corner awarded to Rangers.
Steven McLean signals a free kick to Dundee United in their own half.
Dundee United have been awarded a corner by Steven McLean.
In the minute 9, Important block from the Rangers defence as Mark Connolly fires in a strike for Dundee United.
Dundee United drive upfield and Mark Connolly gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Rangers defender.
Dundee United push forward at Tannadice Park and Mark Reynolds gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Rangers defence.
In the minute 9, Corner awarded to Dundee United.
Dundee United have been awarded a corner by Steven McLean.
Alfredo Morelos for Rangers gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 11, It's a goal kick for the home team in Dundee.
Free kick for Dundee United in their own half.
Alfredo Morelos (Rangers) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 13, In Dundee Dundee United's Lawrence Shankland is caught offside.
Dundee United awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rangers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Dundee United in their own half.
Goal kick for Dundee United at Tannadice Park.
Throw-in Rangers.
In the minute 19, Steven McLean signals a Rangers throw-in in Dundee United's half.
Free kick Rangers.
Ball goes out of play for a Dundee United goal kick.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Rangers in their own half.
Free kick for Dundee United in the half of Rangers.
Rangers have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 24, In Dundee a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Dundee United are pushing forward but Lawrence Shankland's finish is wide of the goal.
Rangers have a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Steven McLean signals a free kick to Rangers.
James Tavernier puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Corner awarded to Rangers.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Dundee United at Tannadice Park.
Steven McLean awards Dundee United a goal kick.
Rangers pushes forward through Kemar Roofe, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Rangers in the half of Dundee United.
Rangers have been awarded a corner by Steven McLean.
Ball goes out of play for a Dundee United goal kick.
In the minute 32, In Dundee Rangers attack through Kemar Roofe. The finish is off target, however.
Liam Smith grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Tannadice Park.
Jamie Robson instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 35, Dundee United awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Rangers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dundee United's half?
Free kick Rangers.
In the minute 38, Jeando Fuchs (Dundee United) has received a yellow card from Steven McLean.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Dundee.
Ball safe as Rangers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Rangers close to the penalty box.
Rangers's James Tavernier misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Dundee United at Tannadice Park.
In the minute 42, Steven McLean signals a free kick to Rangers in their own half.
Alfredo Morelos of Rangers gets in a strike, but is off target.
Dundee United have a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Throw-in Rangers.
In Dundee a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal! Connor Goldson gives Rangers a 1-2 lead.
In the minute 44, That's a fine assist from James Tavernier.
The first-half has ended.
The second half has started at Tannadice Park.
In the minute 46, Rangers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Steven McLean awards Dundee United a goal kick.
Ball safe as Dundee United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Rangers in their own half.
Dundee United to take a throw-in in Rangers territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 49, Rangers have been awarded a corner by Steven McLean.
Steven McLean signals a Rangers throw-in in Dundee United's half.
Rangers are coming forward and Alfredo Morelos gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 52, It's a goal kick for the home team in Dundee.
Free kick for Rangers in their own half.
Steven McLean signals a free kick to Dundee United in their own half.
In the minute 54, Steven McLean awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Dundee United in the half of Rangers.
Throw-in for Rangers at Tannadice Park.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Rangers.
Steven McLean signals a Rangers throw-in in Dundee United's half.
In Dundee, Alfredo Morelos of Rangers is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 59, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Dundee United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Steven McLean signals a free kick to Rangers.
In the minute 63, Steven McLean awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Rangers in the half of Dundee United.
Connor Goldson of Rangers gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 64, Dundee United have a goal kick.
Can Rangers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dundee United's half?
Rangers drives forward and James Tavernier gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 67, Rangers's Borna Barisic misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Dundee United goal kick.
Dundee United awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Rangers in the half of Dundee United.
Rangers push forward at Tannadice Park and Glen Kamara gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Dundee United defence.
Free kick in a good position for Rangers!
In the minute 70, Rangers's Borna Barisic gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Dundee United defender.
Rangers have been awarded a corner by Steven McLean.
Corner awarded to Rangers.
In the minute 71, Goal kick for Dundee United at Tannadice Park.
Rangers's Scott Arfield is on target but unsuccessful.
Dundee United awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dundee United to take a throw-in in Rangers territory.
In the minute 73, Steven Gerrard is making the team's first substitution at Tannadice Park with Cedric Itten replacing Alfredo Morelos.
Dundee United to take a throw-in in Rangers territory.
In the minute 74, Steven McLean awards Rangers a goal kick.
Can Rangers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dundee United's half?
In Dundee Rangers drive forward through Scott Arfield. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Rangers.
Throw-in for Rangers in the half of Dundee United.
Free kick for Rangers in the half of Dundee United.
In the minute 80, Rangers have been awarded a corner by Steven McLean.
Scott Arfield for Rangers drives towards goal at Tannadice Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Rangers have been awarded a corner by Steven McLean.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Dundee United in their own half.
Bongani Zungu is on a sub for Glen Kamara for Rangers.
Steven McLean signals a free kick to Dundee United in their own half.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Rangers at Tannadice Park.
Steven McLean signals a free kick to Rangers.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Dundee.
In the minute 85, Throw-in Rangers.
Throw-in for Rangers at Tannadice Park.
In the minute 86, Steven McLean signals a Rangers throw-in in Dundee United's half.
Darren Watson is replacing Adrian Sporle for the home team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Joe Aribo is replacing Ryan Kent for Rangers at Tannadice Park.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to Rangers.
Rangers's Cedric Itten breaks free at Tannadice Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Dundee United have a goal kick.
In the minute 88, Rangers's Joe Aribo is whistled for offside at Tannadice Park.
Steven McLean signals a Rangers throw-in in Dundee United's half.
Dundee United awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Tannadice Park the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Dundee United get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rangers's half?
Throw-in for Rangers in the half of Dundee United.
Steven McLean awards Dundee United a goal kick.
Free kick Dundee United.
Ryan Edwards of Dundee United smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
That's full-time at Tannadice Park. The final score is 1-2.
